content: ah nice - we have a similar toy here: https://github.com/status-im/nim-beacon-chain/blob/master/research/state_sim.nim (also online: https://arnetheduck.github.io/state_sim/index.html - this is an early wasm edition of that about 6 months old - it needs updating) - we're using just a simple uniform randomness filter for the probabilities - I imagine it could be fun to see what happens in certain scenarios like 1/3 or 1/2 splitting off in to a different network and other similar experiments..
